headline.main: Fish's Aide Indicted as Perjurer; Franked Mail Involved in Counts; Fish's Secretary Is Indicted as Perjurer; Hill Denies Charges Involving Franked Mail

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 24 -- George Hill, secretary of Representative Fish of New York, was indicted today by a Federal grand jury on charges of giving perjured testimony in connection with the inquiry into the activities of Nazi agents in the United States, including George Sylvester Viereck.
abstract: Repr Fish's sec, G Hill, arrested; indicted on perjury charges in connection with franked envelopes and testimony that he did not know Viereck; reptd held after burning franked envelopes behind Amer First Com hdqrs; Fish comments
